EmailTemplate.description: This is template for the email that will be sent to Customer when Cost Sheet with Additional Parking is generated
EmailTemplate.name: Email for Cost Sheet with Additional Parking
EmailTemplate.subject: Updated Cost Sheet
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Please find attached the updated cost sheet for your flat {FlatNumber} at {ProjectName}. Note: If you notice any discrepancies, please contact us within three days of receiving this email. After this period, we will consider the cost sheet final.
